data.name: NOTALONE
data.detailed_description:
Synopsis:

NOTALONE is a single-player horror simulator in which you play the role of 45-year-old Mortie Jones. You learn that your mother is dead and your father is missing. Your task will be to spend the night in your old family home. During the gameplay you will come across notes left by family members from them you will be able to learn the dark corners of the plot.

You can light your way with a lighter, flashlight or glowstick. During the gameplay you may also encounter lying candles that you can light, they will give a source of light for a limited time.

Features:

  • Multiple endings.
  • Climate
  • Ability to save the game
  • Easter Eggs
  • Suspense
  • Rich storyline

Warning:.

NOTALONE contains loud sounds. Enjoy the gameplay.

data.short_description: NOTALONE is a single-player horror simulator in which you play the role of 45-year-old Mortie Jones. You learn that your mother is dead and your father is missing. Your task will be to spend the night in your old family home.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i7 8th
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX1060
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You need mouse, keyboard and monitor.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 12th
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX3080
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You need mouse, keyboard and monitor.
